title: UI Sounds Organic
description: A selection of 400+ unique HQ sounds with a human touch for your user interfaces.
longDescription:
Preview: https://soundcloud.com/soundexmachina/ui-sounds-organic-audio-preview/s-E2Tiw

UI SOUNDS: ORGANIC is a well-organized collection of 425, non digital, selections ranging from simple and discrete to catchy and jolly sounds. The library is ready to use in any kind of electronic user interface (smartphone, tablet, desktop app, web based app or site), smart tv app, wearable device app, UI demonstration videos, infographics, as well as in your games.

GREAT VARIETY, MULTICULTURAL TOUCH, UNIQUE APPROACH

Contains melodic elements from Chinese and Indian woodwinds, harmonica, acoustic guitars and percussion instruments, outlandish vocals as well as elements from metal, concrete, glass and wood parts, kid toys, real switches and buttons, servo sounds, bells, whistles, and various elements such as car keys, coffee mixers and klaxons - all organic.

FREQUENCY-OPTIMIZED, FOR BOTH MOBILE AND HIGH-END SPEAKERS
Meticulously trimmed and calibrated to sound about as loud as each other all sounds created to make developers' lives easier, intended to serve not only those who need minimalist and discrete elements but also those who search for intriguing bold sounds, sounds with more personality for their projects.

Suitable for:
Buttons
Alarms
Notifications
Selections
Menus
Switches
Feedback
Navigation

As well as for other systems or game plays.
